text: Joel Hasse Ferreira (13 July 1944 - 19 March 2022) was a Portuguese politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party of Portugal. Hasse Ferreira was born in Lisbon, Portugal. He was a member of the Assembly of the Republic from 1983 until 1985, 1992 to 2001 and from 2002 until 2005. He was a Member of the European Parliament from 2004 until 2009. Hasse Ferreira died on 19 March 2022 in Lisbon at the age of 77.Morreu antigo deputado e eurodeputado socialista Joel Hasse Ferreira ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:MEPs for Portugal Category:Politicians from Lisbon Category:Socialist politicians
title: Joel Hasse Ferreira
